languages.text: {n}Неприятно оскалившись, Ульфар резко произносит:{/n} "Скверные слова говоришь, эттфатер. Да, жрецы здешние и впрямь кровавые псы, но хулу на Всеотца возводить не смей". {n}Надвинувшись на вас всей своей огромной фигурой, Ульфар грозит пальцем.{/n}

{n}With a feral snarl, Ulfar says sharply,{/n} "You speak tainted words, Aett-Vater. Yes, the priests here are murderous dogs, but do not dare blaspheme the Allfather." {n}Looming over you, Ulfar brandishes his finger at you in warning.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Неприятно оскалившись, Ульфар резко произносит:{/n} "Скверные слова говоришь, эттфатер. Да, жрецы здешние и впрямь кровавые псы, но хулу на Всеотца возводить не смей". {n}Надвинувшись на вас всей своей огромной фигурой, Ульфар грозит пальцем.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}With a feral snarl, Ulfar says sharply,{/n} "You speak tainted words, Aett-Vater. Yes, the priests here are murderous dogs, but do not dare blaspheme the Allfather." {n}Looming over you, Ulfar brandishes his finger at you in warning.{/n}

{n}With a feral snarl, Ulfar says sharply,{/n} "You speak tainted words, Aett-Vater. Yes, the priests here are murderous dogs, but do not dare blaspheme the Allfather." {n}Looming over you, Ulfar brandishes his finger at you in warning.{/n}

{n}With a feral snarl, Ulfar says sharply,{/n} "You speak tainted words, Aett-Vater. Yes, the priests here are murderous dogs, but do not dare blaspheme the Allfather." {n}Looming over you, Ulfar brandishes his finger at you in warning.{/n}

{n}With a feral snarl, Ulfar says sharply,{/n} "You speak tainted words, Aett-Vater. Yes, the priests here are murderous dogs, but do not dare blaspheme the Allfather." {n}Looming over you, Ulfar brandishes his finger at you in warning.{/n}

languages.text: {n}獰猛な唸り声をあげ、ウルファーは鋭く告げる。{/n}「汚れた言葉を吐くんだな、アエット＝ヴァテル。ああ、ここの司祭は殺人犬だ。だが、全知の父を冒涜する恐れ知らずではない」{n}あなたの前に立ちはだかり、ウルファーは指を振りかざして警告する。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a feral snarl, Ulfar says sharply,{/n} "You speak tainted words, Aett-Vater. Yes, the priests here are murderous dogs, but do not dare blaspheme the Allfather." {n}Looming over you, Ulfar brandishes his finger at you in warning.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}獰猛な唸り声をあげ、ウルファーは鋭く告げる。{/n}「汚れた言葉を吐くんだな、アエット＝ヴァテル。ああ、ここの司祭は殺人犬だ。だが、全知の父を冒涜する恐れ知らずではない」{n}あなたの前に立ちはだかり、ウルファーは指を振りかざして警告する。{/n}

languages.text: {n}乌尔法发出了充满野性的咆哮，厉声开了口。{/n}“狼领，你这是亵渎之言。没错，这里的牧师都是恶犬，但他们绝不敢亵渎全父。”{n}乌尔法欺身逼近你，摇了摇手指，表示警告。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a feral snarl, Ulfar says sharply,{/n} "You speak tainted words, Aett-Vater. Yes, the priests here are murderous dogs, but do not dare blaspheme the Allfather." {n}Looming over you, Ulfar brandishes his finger at you in warning.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}乌尔法发出了充满野性的咆哮，厉声开了口。{/n}“狼领，你这是亵渎之言。没错，这里的牧师都是恶犬，但他们绝不敢亵渎全父。”{n}乌尔法欺身逼近你，摇了摇手指，表示警告。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ulfar pousse un grondement féroce et réplique vivement :{/n} « Votre discours est entaché de mensonges, aett-vater. Les prêtres sont ici des serpents assassins, certes, mais ne vous risquez pas à injurier le Père de Tous. » {n}Il vous toise de tout son haut en pointant un doigt sur vous en guise d'avertissement.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a feral snarl, Ulfar says sharply,{/n} "You speak tainted words, Aett-Vater. Yes, the priests here are murderous dogs, but do not dare blaspheme the Allfather." {n}Looming over you, Ulfar brandishes his finger at you in warning.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar pousse un grondement féroce et réplique vivement :{/n} « Votre discours est entaché de mensonges, aett-vater. Les prêtres sont ici des serpents assassins, certes, mais ne vous risquez pas à injurier le Père de Tous. » {n}Il vous toise de tout son haut en pointant un doigt sur vous en guise d'avertissement.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, con un gruñido salvaje, dice bruscamente:{/n} «Sus palabras son erradas, Aett-Vater. Los sacerdotes de por aquí serán unos perros asesinos, sí, pero ni se le ocurra blasfemar en el nombre del Padre de todas las cosas».{n}Acercándose a ti, Ulfar te señala a modo de advertencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a feral snarl, Ulfar says sharply,{/n} "You speak tainted words, Aett-Vater. Yes, the priests here are murderous dogs, but do not dare blaspheme the Allfather." {n}Looming over you, Ulfar brandishes his finger at you in warning.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ulfar, con un gruñido salvaje, dice bruscamente:{/n} «Sus palabras son erradas, Aett-Vater. Los sacerdotes de por aquí serán unos perros asesinos, sí, pero ni se le ocurra blasfemar en el nombre del Padre de todas las cosas».{n}Acercándose a ti, Ulfar te señala a modo de advertencia.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mit einem ungezähmten Knurren sagt Ulfar scharf:{/n} "Ihr sagt vergiftete Worte, Aett-Vater. Ja, die Priester hier sind mörderische Hunde, aber wagt es nicht, den Allvater zu beleidigen." {n}Ulfar richtet warnend seinen Finger auf dich.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a feral snarl, Ulfar says sharply,{/n} "You speak tainted words, Aett-Vater. Yes, the priests here are murderous dogs, but do not dare blaspheme the Allfather." {n}Looming over you, Ulfar brandishes his finger at you in warning.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einem ungezähmten Knurren sagt Ulfar scharf:{/n} "Ihr sagt vergiftete Worte, Aett-Vater. Ja, die Priester hier sind mörderische Hunde, aber wagt es nicht, den Allvater zu beleidigen." {n}Ulfar richtet warnend seinen Finger auf dich.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ulfar, yabani bir hırıltıyla birden konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Sözlerin kirli Aett-Vater. Buradaki rahipler birer katil köpek olabilir ama Yücebaba'ya sakın saygısızlık etmeyesin." {n}Âdeta tepene çıkan Ulfar, parmağını uyarı mahiyetinde sana doğrultuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a feral snarl, Ulfar says sharply,{/n} "You speak tainted words, Aett-Vater. Yes, the priests here are murderous dogs, but do not dare blaspheme the Allfather." {n}Looming over you, Ulfar brandishes his finger at you in warning.{/n}
